text: Carlos Lucas Manríquez (4 June 1930 – 19 April 2022) was a Chilean boxer. He won the bronze medal in the light heavyweight division at the 1956 Summer Olympics.Olympic results He also won bronze at the 1959 Pan American Games in Chicago. Lucas was born in Villarrica, Chile. Lucas died on 19 April 2022, aged 91.Fallece Carlos Lucas Manríquez, ex medallista olímpico en Melbourne 1956 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic medalists for Chile Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Boxers Category:Medalists at the 1956 Summer Olympics
title: Carlos Lucas
